body.name: POMUIC Bluetooth Shower Speaker, Portable Wireless Speaker Stereo Sound, RGB Lights, IP7 Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Suction Cup and Mic, 8H Portable Speakers for Travel, Party, Home, Outdoors
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 12 hrs 6 mins
features: 【360° Hi-Fi Stereo Sound】: 40mm size bass dual diaphragm, combined with rounded guide cone design, explosive power with amazing translucent treble and shocking bass, this bluetooth speaker has an advanced digital signal processor that ensures superior clarity and zero distortion at any volume.

【IPX7 100% Waterproof】:Waterproof Shower Speaker has IPX7 waterproof rating to protect against rain, dust, snow, and splashes.Durable silicone enclosure and port covers give the speaker better internal protection, perfect for parties, pools, beaches, camping or hiking. And with convenient removable suction cups, it can be firmly adhered to a variety of smooth surfaces, very convenient.

【Powerful Battery】:The durable portable speaker bluetooth has a built-in high-capacity 1000mAh battery that provides 7-8 hours of playback time, with a newly upgraded Type-C universal charging port, more convenient for on-the-go use.

【Stable Bluetooth 5.3 Connection】: Bluetooth 5.0 technology has better, stable signal and high transmission rate to ensure reliability. POMUIC wireless speakers bluetooth supports connecting to all iOS/Android devices, and the built-in microphone enables hands-free calling, bringing you more flexibility.

【RGB Colorful Light Show】: The wireless LED Bluetooth speakers features 7 LED light modes to provide different color-changing themes. The rainbow light show will pulse and flicker with the beat of the music, enjoying the music with gradient lights will bring you a real party atmosphere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little shower speaker
reviews.reviewText: Packed full of features, this speaker is great for the shower due to its large suction cup. Most of the ones I've owned have a small one that is also made as a one piece design of the speaker, so if damaged you lose the waterproof capabilities of the speaker too. This has a suction cup that is attachable and is twice the size so it remains where you stick it. Connects right away and has a digital display, which is something you don't often find on a Bluetooth speaker. It shows your battery meter and is used for both radio mode (new one for me) and clock, which I haven't set up because I haven't any need for it personally. The controls are very straightforward and the battery lasts for several uses before needing a charge. You can also disable the lights to extend battery life even more if desired. It is the only shower speaker I use now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Speaker!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my wife and she loves it! It's plenty loud and with good sound clarity. It's the perfect size for the shower so it's not too bulky but also not too small where it's hard to press the buttons. Can be placed on any flat surface thanks to the included suction cup. Instructions to pair are easy to follow as well. I would recommend this to others wanting a good shower speaker for a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use. LED lights are fun for both in and out of the shower/bath. Suction cup has great suction. Connects easily to phone, charging is easy, and dries quickly. Sound is amazing. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the Bathroom
reviews.reviewText: Great for listening to music in the shower, talking on the phone, the colors are so cool, the music sounds decent, good quality on calls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don’t let the reviews fool you!
reviews.reviewText: You heard me, the reviewers don’t seem to know what they’re talking about when they refer to the sound quality. Yes, this speaker plays loudly, yes, it’s easy to pair, and yes, it sounds amazing for most songs. But this speaker seems to be missing the melody that would normally play out of either a left or right speaker. It’s like it’s in stereo but without the second speaker.If you try and listen to a ballad like Dream On by Aerosmith for prime example, right at the beginning of the song during the instrumental, there’s a little trill they do on guitar leading up to the vocals that’s normally only heard from one side speaker in your car or in your headphones, well, it’s completely missing with this speaker and it ruins so many songs because of that! Another example is Poison by Bell Biv Devoe, right at the beginning before the vocals the “tap tap tap… WHAM” 2 of those WHAMs are meant to be in a different speaker from the other two and you can’t hear them! You can only just barely hear it because the speaker they’ve chosen (left or right, I’m not sure) to designate this speaker to wasn’t meant to play that part of the song so it goes missing or incredibly faint. Not many people seemed to pick up on that before leaving a review, and I’m paired to an iPhone 13 Pro Max with the latest update, so I doubt it’s my phone.Now, I did request an exchange to see if I just got a bad speaker, turns out no, that’s just how it is apparently, and I don’t like that considering the old cheaper shower speaker I’m replacing plays all sounds of a song just perfectly, just not as loud as this speaker. While I had both the exchange and the purchased speaker in my possession I noticed the instruction said you could pair two speakers together. I followed the instructions and… I cannot for the life of me figure out how to get the two speakers to pair together. I was hoping this would solve my problem and designate one as a left and one as a right speaker, then I would just let the return date run out and let them charge me for the second speaker. But no… I can’t seem to pair them together as instructed, they only want to either play from one or the other.In conclusion, speaker sounds absolutely fantastic until you get a song that plays different elements in the left and right speaker, that’s when this speaker shows its ugly head in bad programming. It’s like it’s set to “stereo” when it should be set to “mono” if you recall speaker settings on an old tv. It makes certain songs too difficult to listen to and ruins the vibe, I do not recommend this speaker for that reason alone. Everything else is just fine, even the forced 24hr clock that updates once you pair your phone, I can live with it. But the missing song elements is a major foul for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shower speaker
reviews.reviewText: Loved this product! My kids love listening to music in the shower/tub and this was perfect. Perfect size to fit anywhere in your shower with the suction cup on the back and battery life is great too. It has different light modes and you can also answer/ take calls through the speaker. Also great for anywhere around the house too. Highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Stopped working after about a month. Sat on a shelf in the shower not exposed to direct water but condensation. Made sure it was completely dry before charging it and it was always shaken out after use. I didn't leave it on either. Turned it off after every shower. It turns on but after 5 seconds shuts off. Doesn't stay on. Usually that's what other speakers did when water got into the electronics. Had full charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my teenagers and they absolutely love it! Easy to connect, great sound, and stays suctioned to the wall without falling off. Battery life is great too! Definitely recommend this purchase!

Zunächst einmal möchte ich anmerken, dass mir der Lautsprecher kostenlos zum Testen zur Verfügung gestellt wurde.Nachdem ich ihn ausgepackt und Bluetooth am Handy aktiviert hatte, war der Lautsprecher sofort sichtbar. Das Verbinden hat problemlos geklappt. Nach dem Einschalten wurde zunächst eine falsche Uhrzeit angezeigt, die sich innerhalb kürzester Zeit automatisch richtig eingestellt hat. Es kann zwischen verschiedenen Lichtmodi hin und her geschaltet werden. Gerade für Kinder dürfte das ein interessantes Gimmick sein. Alternativ lässt sich das Licht komplett abschalten.Nun kommen wir zum wichtigsten Kriterium eines Lautsprechers: Der Klang ist einwandfrei. Ich habe das Gerät auf dem Schreibtisch ausprobiert und im Hintergrund laufen lassen. Keine Verzerrungen oder ähnliches. Die Lautstärke ist schon auf der untersten Stufe laut genug, um im Hintergrund Musik etc. zu hören. Bei voller Lautstärke ist der Klang immer noch klar, mir ist es dann aber zu laut. Vielleicht ändert sich das im Sommer im Garten.Der Lautsprecher ist sehr handlich und kann überall gut mit hingenommen werden. Gerade auf Reisen wird er uns sicherlich zukünftig begleiten und an Tablet und Handy angeschlossen seine Dienste verrichten. Dann werden wir am Pool sicherlich auch davon profitieren, dass er "wasserdicht bei Untertauchen für kurze Zeit" sein soll.Insgesamt vergebe ich eine klare Kaufempfehlung.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena calidad de sonido y totalmente impermeable
reviews.reviewText: Para lo pequeño que es tiene buena calidad de sonido.Es impermeable, por lo que se puede usar sin problemas en la ducha o ambientes muy húmedos.Tiene varios modos de luces de colores y modo apagado (sin luces)La batería dura bastante, algo más de 8 horas (depende del nivel del volumen)La conexión por BT al dispositivo es rápida y fácil. Una vez conectado, ya lo recuerda.Viene en una caja robusta y bien acabada en medio de una protección contra golpes y hay otra caja en la que viene la ventosa y el cable de carga. Todo con un excelente aspecto.Sin duda tiene una gran relación calidad/precio.

La qualità delle casse è ottima, buon volume e buona qualità di alti e bassi.È facile da configurare e da usare.usato pure sotto la doccia e funziona veramente bene ip67.unica pecca i led non mettono in evidenza i tasti funzione.

Petite enceinte mais avec un grand son, elle se balade partout avec un bon son clair avec de bonne basses, s’utilise aussi bien ds la vie de ts les jours que sous la douche! Avec sa lumière polyvalente et changeantvparmis différent mode de led, elle s’utilise facilement et simplement, vous la branchez, vous allez dans le Bluetooth de votre téléphone, vous rechercher un appareil à Connect et direct vous la retrouvez et cliquez dessus et elle est jumelé, vous pouvez mm changer le nom de votre enceinte. Et hop à vous les bons moments de detente
Enceinte parfaite en cabine de douche avec sa ventouse puissante qui colle bien à la parois et son puissant et propre sans grésillement .
